page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: Our area contains three villages Northend,Knightcote and Gaydon.Gaydon is the biggest.It has a petrol station and also a shop made from wood with a tin roof.Gaydon has no school so the children of Gaydon go to Lighthorne Heath school.Gaydon also has one church and one village hall. Northend is the next biggest village. It has a more modern shop than Gaydon with a post office inside.Northend School is 133 years old.67 children go to that school. Northend also has one church,one chapel and one village hall. Knightcote is the smallest village. Their shop has a garden in front of it.Knightcote is like Gaydon with no school so the children go to Northend school.Knightcote has a chapel and a village hall. Most of the land is farmland.
